channel.description: Recent content in imagebuilder on 🤠 Major Hayden

item.title: Build a custom CentOS Stream 9 cloud image
item.description: Learn how to customize a CentOS Stream 9 cloud image with the stuff you want and nothing that you don’t. 📦

item.title: Deploy a custom Fedora 35 AMI to AWS with Image Builder
item.description: Want to build your own Fedora 35 image for AWS? Use Image Builder to build and deploy an image made just for you. 🏗

item.title: Build Fedora AWS images in GitHub Actions with Image Builder
item.description: Build images for AWS and deploy them to your AWS account all within GitHub Actions. 🤖
